mapper.select: select u.username, p.id, user_id, plate_name, create_time, p.status from bs_bbs.tb_plate p join bs_bbs.tb_user u on p.user_id=u.id order by create_time desc limit #{startIndex},#{pageSize};
mapper.insert: insert into bs_bbs.tb_plate(plate_name, user_id, create_time) VALUES (#{plateName},#{userId},#{createTime})

mapper.update: update bs_bbs.tb_home_plate set top=#{top} where plate_id=#{id};
